segments.pli: “Pubbevāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno pañca dhamme bhāvesiṃ, pañca dhamme bahulīkāsiṃ.
segments.en: “Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still not awake but intent on awakening—I developed and cultivated five things.

segments.pli: Chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvesiṃ, vīriyasamādhi … cittasamādhi … vīmaṃsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvesiṃ, ussoḷhiññeva pañcamiṃ.
segments.en: The basis of psychic power that has immersion due to enthusiasm, and active effort … the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to energy, and active effort … the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to mental development, and active effort … the basis of psychic power that has immersion due to inquiry, and active effort. And the fifth is sheer vigor.

segments.pli: So kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, imesaṃ ussoḷhipañcamānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṃ abhininnāmesiṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
segments.en: When I had developed and cultivated these five things, with vigor as fifth,

segments.pli: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane.
segments.en: I became capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight to which I extended the mind, in each and every case.

segments.pli: So sace ākaṅkhiṃ: ‘anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhaveyyaṃ … pe … yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vatteyyan’ti,
segments.en: If I wished: ‘May I multiply myself and become one again … controlling the body as far as the Brahmā realm.’

segments.pli: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane.
segments.en: I was capable of realizing it, in each and every case.

segments.pli: So sace ākaṅkhiṃ … pe … ‘āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihareyyan’ti,
segments.en: If I wished: … ‘May I realize the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and live having realized it with my own insight due to the ending of defilements.’

segments.pli: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇiṃ sati sati āyatane”ti.
segments.en: I was capable of realizing it, in each and every case.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, before my awakening—when I was still not awake…

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha developed the bases for psychic power, which lead to his awakening.
